      • getBoardPoints

        public java.lang.Integer[] getBoardPoints()
        Return an array of Integer made from a sublist of the board points. The sublist is the board points list without the first N elements. N is equals to the number of skull placed on the board.
        Returns:
        an array of the board points

      • getDamageCount

        public int getDamageCount()
        Returns:
        the count of damage suffered

      • getMarkCount

        public int getMarkCount()
        Returns:
        the count of mark suffered

      • flipBoard

        public void flipBoard()
               throws BoardAlreadyFlippedException,
                      BoardFlipDamagedException
        Tries to flip the player board changing the player board points and removing all the skulls on it
        Throws:
        BoardAlreadyFlippedException - if the player board is already flipped
        BoardFlipDamagedException - if there is damage on the player board

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo​(Ammo ammo)
        Adds an ammo to player board
        Parameters:
        ammo - to add to player board
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when ammo is null

      • useAmmo

        public void useAmmo​(AmmoQuantity cost)
             throws NotEnoughAmmoException
        Pays the cost of ammo
        Parameters:
        cost - of operation
        Throws:
        NotEnoughAmmoException - if there aren't enough ammo to pay the operation

      • addDamageNoMark

        public void addDamageNoMark​(Player damageDealer,
                            int damageCount)
        Adds damages on the player board without triggering the marks
        Parameters:
        damageDealer - player who inflicted the damage
        damageCount - number of damages inflicted

      • onDeath

        public void onDeath()
        Modify the player board on death. Keeps everything except the damages list and adds a skull on the player board
